content.rendered:
Marine Insure offer years of insurance experience and knowledge within the Marine Industry. We work with you to gain a comprehensive understanding of your Insurance needs and requirements. Marine Insure offer risk management recommendations specific to your marine business needs. This enables Marine Insure to work with specialist marine Insurers to negotiate favourable terms on your behalf.

Choosing the right Insurance policy for your business can be the difference between you having a positive claim experience, verse suffering an uninsured loss which can be devastating to your business.

Marine Insure are customer focused insurance advisers offering Insurance solutions for the commercial marine trades and occupations below, but not limited to:

  • Marina Operators
  • Boat Builders
  • Boat and Ship Repairers
  • Marine Mechanics & Electricians
  • Marine Dealers
  • Boat Yards
  • Marine Hull cleaners and antifouling
  • Rigger including Installation and maintenance
  • Charter Vessel Operators
  • Marine Surveyors
  • Commercial Hull
  • Protection and Indemnity
  • Upholsters
  • Boat Stackers
  • Workshops
  • Property Owners
  • Welding and Hot Works
  • Slipway and Drydock Operators and Owners
  • Swing Mooring Installation & Repairs
  • Fuelling Facilities
  • Gas Fitters

Contact Marine Insure today on 07 2142 0355 to discuss your insurance requirements with one of our expert advisers or click HERE to send us an email.
